attributes.action: Stop Business's Dictating When Employees Can Take Hoildays, No More Embargo's
attributes.background: Business's in the Uk dictate when people can and can't have holidays. They get around this with Embargos but these rules don't apply to everyone. The government should intervene and stop this!! When people require Hoildays which they are owed they should be allowed to choose!!

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to pass a law that makes it illegal to refuse employees any request for holiday, if that's what you want to happen.
